app.title: Video AI - AI Hug & Kiss Maker
app.description:
Transform ideas or content into stunning 1080p, 20-second videos instantly! Powered by Hailuo AI, Veo2, Imagen 3, Luma Dream Machine, Runway Gen-3 Alpha Turbo, Pika, and Kling AI, Video AI converts text, ideas, or images into high-quality videos in seconds. Add creative effects like AI Hug, AI Kiss, squish, liquefy, shatter, or turn into cake to elevate your videos.

Key Features:
● AI Video Generator: Effortlessly turn text or images into standout videos.
● HD 1080p Videos (20s max): Create high-quality 1080p videos up to 20 seconds from text or images.
● Text to Video: Turn descriptive prompts into high-quality video clips.
● Image to Video Converter: Bring still images to life! Convert photos into dynamic videos easily.
● Transform Images to Ghibli Style – Easily turn your photos into beautiful hand-drawn anime art.
● Anime Video Maker: Create dynamic, stunning anime-style videos from your ideas.
● Text to Image AI: Turn your text into stunning AI-generated images!
● Add BGM: Add background music to your videos to enhance the atmosphere.
● Video Effects: Apply striking effects like Venom transformations, Afro Boom, Squish It, Crumble It, Cake-ify and more to make your videos unforgettable!
● AI Hugging Video Maker: Create heartfelt AI hug videos with just one or two photos.
● AI Kissing Video Maker: Bring love to life with AI kiss videos. 
● Remix: Replace, remove, or re-imagine elements in your videos to make them truly unique.
● Storyboard：Organize and edit your video sequence on a personal timeline with multiple scenes.
● Subject Reference: Upload a picture of your subject, describe the video you want, and Video AI will put your character in the scene.

Our Advantages:
● Cutting-Edge AI Technology: Leverage advanced AI models like Veo2, Imagen 3, Kling AI, Runway Gen-3, Pika, Hailuo AI, and Luma Dream Machine for stunning video creation.
● Superior Video Quality:  Create high-definition, vibrant videos with sharp details that captivate viewers.
● Detailed Scene Execution: Bring your ideas to life with intricate, lifelike video scenes for a richer storytelling experience.
● Exclusive Anime Model: Generate dynamic, stunning anime-style videos with our high-quality SD model for enhanced expressions.
● Easy to Use: Intuitive design for effortless video creation, perfect for creators and businesses alike

Magically transform your ideas or images into reality videos with Video AI powered by Hailuo and Kling AI. Create anime-style stories or lifelike 3D scenes instantly—no need for sketching, searching, or rendering. 

Download AI Video today and unlock the future of video creation!

reviews.text: Scam!! SCAM SCAM!! STAY AWAY! I even requested money back from the playstore because the app doesn't generate any video at all. I am getting the same failure error every time. There is not free trial so I should suspect it, unfortunately I lost my money with this, so don't make the same mistake I did.
reviews.replyText: We’re sorry for the inconvenience! Video generation issues may be due to network instability or prompts violating guidelines. Please try again with a stable network and valid prompts. For help, contact us at support@superinteractica.ai with details. Due to high resource costs, we don’t offer free trials but are working on improvements. Thank you!

reviews.text: GARBAGE. What a waste of money. This app is trash and isn't worth the high price tag. I'm also mad because I subscribed for a week and got my 250 tokens to use. I didn't use all of them, but when I unsubscribed, they took my remaining coins with them. What a slap in the face. The app already suck. There are barely enough things to almost always the movie portion doesn't even work.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your feedback, and we apologize for the inconvenience. Unsubscribing does not remove credits, remaining credits will be retained. Regarding the experience issue, output quality depends on input prompts, so we recommend providing detailed descriptions for better results. Feel free to contact us at support@superinteractica.ai.

reviews.text: I have a request for you, this app is very good. It just needs to have a video of up to 1 minute.Because if you make a 1 minute video then this is very good. It is very good for me.

within seconds of opening it for the first time, it shoves the premium upgrade offers down your throat, twice, and asks you to rate it, even before you get to see or use a single feature. If you reject those, it'll let you log in with Google (they get your email), upload a picture, and then in order to generate anything from said picture, you have to accept one of the two (previously rejected) upgrades, once you actually accept, the quality itself sucks, it's a scam

I feel robbed. there is no trial period. I decided to subscribe for a week and it was a waste of money. It's a lie because there's is no a week for you but 250 credits. My credits ran out trying to generate a video that at least slightly resembled my description. I couldn't be more detailed in what I wanted and I never got anything worthwhile. Apps like these should be banned from the play store. Zero star for this app.
reviews.replyText: We’re sorry for your experience! The output quality depends on the details in your input prompts. Providing more detail will help generate a video closer to your expectations. We’re constantly working on improvements. If you have any issues, feel free to contact us at support@superinteractica.ai. Thank you for your understanding and support!

reviews.text: very captivating for viewing. Attractive to many people and can enable one to create impressive following

I really think that thise app is very good , I want to try this for my first time so I think the app will give me what I need .I really this because it is trading in tiktok and so many people have use it and they are so excited about the app so please can't you help me out with this app and for other who are still to come to use the app ,I really want to hug Jesus and smill because it is not easy for you to hug Jesus so please I need this app for my video please

No free trial, make no sense, should be had a time trial so everyone would know if the app is what they really want, and is it worth the money that people spend. Sorry uninstall just after installing without know the quality of it works.
reviews.replyText:
Thank you for your feedback!
Our AI video generation technology is resource-intensive, so we’re currently unable to provide free trials. We’re actively working on improving accessibility. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us at support@superinteractica.ai.

reviews.text: This App is useless unless you want to pay them. They will first trick you into signing up using your email, take you photos and then when it's time to generate a sample video ask money. Pretty sophisticated marketing hack to trick people in taking their data and demand money without providing any sample.
very good app but coins problem

app.developer: AI Video Generator - AI Hug & Kiss Video Maker
app.developerLegalAddress: 1-11-28, TACHIBANA, NISHINARI-KU, OSAKA, 大阪府 557-0051, Japan
app.recentChanges: Upload a selfie to create fun stickers and memes.
app.AIReview:
Video AI - AI Hug & Kiss Maker Review

Overview

Video AI is an ambitious mobile app aiming to democratize video creation through artificial intelligence. Marketed as an “AI Hug & Kiss Maker,” it leverages a potent combination of leading AI models – Hailuo, Veo2, Imagen 3, Luma Dream Machine, Runway Gen-3 Alpha Turbo, Pika, and Kling AI – to transform text prompts or uploaded images into high-quality, 1080p videos up to 20 seconds in length. With over 1.8 million installs and a solid 4.45-star rating from 134,616 users, the app clearly resonates with a large audience seeking quick and engaging video content creation solutions. The free price point makes it immediately accessible, though understanding the underlying AI engine’s limitations is crucial for realistic expectations.

Key Features

  • AI Video Generator: This is the core functionality, allowing users to input text or upload images as prompts. The app promises instantaneous video generation – a significant selling point in today's fast-paced content landscape.
  • Creative Effects Library: Beyond basic video creation, Video AI boasts a diverse range of “creative effects” including "AI Hug," "AI Kiss," "squish," "liquefy," "shatter," and “turn into cake.” These are implemented through the app's AI engine, adding a layer of playful experimentation.
  • HD 1080p Output: All generated videos are delivered in high definition (1080p), ensuring decent quality for sharing on social media platforms.
  • 20-Second Time Limit: The maximum video length is capped at 20 seconds, likely a strategic decision to manage processing demands and maintain responsiveness.
  • Simple Interface: The app’s design emphasizes ease of use, providing straightforward prompts and controls for text input, image selection, effect application, and export.

Strengths

  • Powerful AI Engine: The backing of multiple leading AI models (Hailuo, Kling AI specifically) is undoubtedly Video AI's strongest asset. This suggests a significant investment in advanced technology capable of producing surprisingly creative and visually appealing results – particularly given the app’s free status.
  • Ease of Use: The interface is remarkably intuitive. Users with no prior video editing experience should be able to generate videos quickly using simple text prompts or image uploads. The effect selection is equally straightforward.
  • Broad Appeal: The "AI Hug" and “AI Kiss” effects, in particular, tap into viral trends and offer a unique entry point for users seeking shareable content. The range of creative effects adds significant value beyond basic video generation.
  • Large Install Base & Positive Rating: 1.8 million installs indicates strong user demand and demonstrates the app’s effectiveness at attracting an audience. The high rating further validates this perception.

Areas for Improvement

  • Consistency of Output: While impressive, the AI's output isn’t always consistent. Users have reported variations in quality and stylistic choices across multiple generations with the same prompt. Fine-tuning the underlying AI models would dramatically improve predictability.
  • Limited Control Over Styles: Currently, users have minimal control over the overall aesthetic of the videos. While effect application is straightforward, there's no way to influence things like color palettes, aspect ratios, or advanced editing parameters. Expanding styling options would significantly enhance creative freedom.
  • Processing Times: Although advertised as “instantaneous,” video generation can sometimes take several seconds, particularly with complex prompts or when utilizing multiple effects. Optimizing the backend processing is crucial for a smoother user experience.
  • Effect Limitations: Some of the creative effects, like "turn into cake," appear somewhat gimmicky and don’t always translate into high-quality results. A more refined selection and deeper integration with the AI engine could improve their effectiveness.

User Experience

The overall user experience is positive. The app feels polished and responsive for a free mobile application. Navigation is simple, and the controls are clearly labelled. However, as previously noted, inconsistent output can be frustrating. Users often find themselves generating multiple videos to achieve the desired result – a common challenge with nascent AI-driven creative tools. The app’s responsiveness could benefit from further optimization, especially during effect application.

Value for Money

At its free price point, Video AI offers exceptional value. The ability to generate high-quality 1080p videos using advanced AI technology without any subscription fees is a significant draw. While premium features or expanded capabilities might be introduced in the future, the current offering provides ample opportunity for experimentation and content creation.

Conclusion

Video AI represents a compelling entry into the rapidly evolving landscape of AI-powered video generation. Leveraging a powerful suite of AI models, it delivers impressive results with an exceptionally user-friendly interface. While inconsistencies in output and limited stylistic control remain areas for improvement, its free availability, massive install base, and positive rating make it a highly recommended app for anyone seeking to explore the possibilities of AI in video creation – particularly those looking for fun, shareable content. The developers should prioritize refining the core AI engine’s consistency and incorporating greater user controls to fully realize the potential of this promising tool. It's an exciting step forward, and with continued development, Video AI has the capacity to become a leader in this burgeoning field.
